slug.description: A human friendly string used in the URL

created_at.description: The date the registration was created. This is when the checkout process was started, not when payment was made.

updated_at.description: The date the registration was last updated.

completed_at.description: The time at which the registration was completed and tickets were created for it.

discount_code.description: The discount code used when registering.

email.description: The email address of the registration.

expires_at.description: The time at which the registration will expire if it has not been completed. Only registrations containing tickets for *locked* releases can expire. A release is *locked* when all of its available tickets are in the process of being registered.

ip_address.description: The IP address when the registration was created.

name.description: The full name of the person who registered

payment_reference.description: The purchase order number of the registration.

company_name.description: The company name of the person who registered

phone_number.description: The phone number of the person who registered

receipt_paid.description: Whether the registration has been paid or not. False would indicate that either this is a free ticket or the customer has been invoiced but that they haven't paid yet.

reference.description: A randomly generated 4 character string unique to the event.

source.description: The `Source` Tracking code that the person registered under.

state.description:
*It's new…*
`new`
`ready`
`redirected`

*It's being processed…*
`ready_to_process`
`processing`
`payment_details_stored`
`payment_charged`

*It's finished…*
`complete`
`incomplete`
`cancelled`
`confirmed`
`customer_cancelled`

*Something went wrong…*
`errored`
`payment_declined`
`not_fulfilled`

test_mode.description: Default: `true` if test mode is enabled for you or for your entire event, otherwise `false`.

consented_at.description: The date the person consented to providing their information during registration.

paid.description: Whether the registration is free (false) or paid (true). This doesn't indicate whether an registration paid by invoice is paid or not - see the receipt_paid attribute for that.

refunded.description: Whether the registration has been refunded.

tickets_count.description: The number of tickets purchased when registering.

quantities.description: The number of `Tickets` for each `Release` that were registered.

receipts.description: A list of `Receipts` for this registration.

refunds.description: A list of `Refunds` for this registration.

tickets.description: A list of `Tickets` for this registration.

line_items.description: A list of `LineItems` for this registration: `release_id` and `quantity`.

billing_address_attributes.description: A hash of billing address attributes used to update `address`, `city`, `country`, `state_province_region`, `vat_number` and `zip_postal_code`

notify.description: Set this to true to send emails to the person registering and the organisers (if they have chosen to receive notifications). Default is false (no emails).
